7.eng-name: The Book of the Adhan (The Call to Prayer)

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Hurairah, who heard it from the mouth of the Messenger of Allah (S.A.W):"The Mu'adhdhin will be forgiven as far as his voice reaches, and every wet and dry thing will bear witness for him

chapter.eng-name: Raising The Voice With The Adhan
